Update: HR 1426 was favorably reported to the Full Committee by a voice vote.

Update: HR 5527 was favorably reported to the Full Committee by a voice vote.

Update: HR 5518 was favorably reported to the Full Committee by a voice vote.

Update: HR 3079 was favorably reported to the Full Committee by a voice vote.
